summary: The diff implements most of the required changes for adding 'Follow Up' task support. REQ-1 (backend) and REQ-2 (frontend checklist) are fully implemented. REQ-3 and REQ-4 cannot be confirmed from the diff as the key files workflowTokens.ts, IconFollowUp.tsx, and WorkflowIcon.tsx are not included in the modified files list.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update workflowTokens.ts to assign an aqua color token to 'Follow Up' and ensure IconFollowUp.tsx uses this aqua color.
missing_requirements.reason: Neither frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/workflowTokens.ts nor frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/IconFollowUp.tsx appear in the diff as added or modified files. There is no evidence these files were updated.

missing_requirements.requirement: WorkflowIcon.tsx must map the 'Follow Up' task type string to the IconFollowUp component.
missing_requirements.reason: frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/WorkflowIcon.tsx does not appear in the diff as added or modified. There is no evidence the dispatcher was updated to handle the 'Follow Up' task type.
